question: Which is the only country in Central America with English as the official language?
explanation: English is the official language of Belize. It is because Belize was a former British colony. It is the only country in Central America with English as the official language. Belizeans also speak English based Creole called Belize Creole. Belize is also home to several Mayan languages such as Q'eqchi, Mopan, Yucatec Mayans.
